objects.text:
• Japanese Quartz Movement
• Stainless Steel Design
• Chronograph Function
• 3ATM Water Resistant

product_details.description: ⌚Movement: Japanese imported quartz analog movement and battery, provide precise time and long-term running. The watch can be used for more than 1 years. ⌚Material: The strap is made of stainless steel, comfortable and soft and breathable. Mineral glasses, 304 steel case, Suit for all kinds of occasions. ⌚Sports chronograph: Multifunctional sub-dial can work, chronograph, calendar, run seconds. Provide you with multi-function purpose use. ⌚3ATM waterproof: This watch is waterproof 30m, can withstand daily splash or short immersion in water, but not swimming and showering, diving or snorkeling. ☎After sales service: Each product has 1-year after sales service. If you have any questions about the product, please contact me immediately and we will give you a satisfactory solution. Item width - 4.2 centimeters ** Clasp type - Push Button Foldover Clasp With Safety ** Country of Origin - China **

banner_details:
This banner showcases a modern and luxurious design suitable for promoting premium watches. The layout is split with a dark geometric grid background, enhancing a sense of precision and luxury. A metallic black chronograph watch is prominently displayed on the right, creating visual balance and emphasizing the product. The left side features text layers: bold uppercase headings ("heading_1" and "heading_2") in a futuristic gold tone, supported by a sleek subheading ("subheading") in white. Below, a concise list in white ("description") outlines key features. A large price tag ("price") and a gold call-to-action button ("cta_button" and "cta") complete the compelling composition.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black: #121212
- Charcoal Gray: #1E1E1E, #252525, #2C2C2C
- Light Gray Lines: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)
- Gold Highlight: #D4AF37
- White Text: #FFFFFF
- CTA Text (Black): #000000
product_color: This product image features a sleek men's wristwatch with a predominantly monochromatic, metallic aesthetic. The color palette is centered around deep blacks, gradients of gunmetal gray, and steel silver tones, which blend seamlessly to create a sophisticated, modern look. The black stainless steel strap and case frame (#1C1C1C) provides a bold, high-contrast foundation. The dial face transitions smoothly from medium gray (#4B4B4B) at the center to darker graphite tones (#2E2E2E) towards the outer edges, providing depth and dimensionality. Silver elements (#C0C0C0) like the chronograph dials and time markers add highlights, ensuring readability while enhancing the product’s luxurious aura.
